body:
We have non-trivial code for determining which tests will run in AR (also in other suites). I like to see the verbose output to make sure the test command is correct.

--
Aaron Patterson
http://tenderlovemaking.com/

On Feb 2, 2012, at 4:11 PM, kennyj<reply@reply.github.com> wrote:

> I just was wondering the difference.
> And I was having a question "AM is quiet. Why?"
> Thus I wanted to get consistency.
> 
> If we set verbose = false, I thought the output included everything I need to watch.
> warnings, test result, the cause of problem...
> 
> Anyway I agree with fixing master.
> 
> --- 
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
> https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/3892#issuecomment-3789539
